title: Belichick vs. Brady, Congressional Hearing and The NBA Draft | Best of I AM ATHLETE Tonight Week Eight
description: Rob Gronkowski has officially retired, which led to a debate on the job Bill Belichick has done with the Patriots and who deserves the most credit: Belichick or Brady. Legal analyst Amy Dash visits to break down what happened in Washington as Roger Goodell met the Congressional Committee investigating Daniel Snyder. Plus, IAA Tonight breakdown the NBA Draft as it happens.
author: smanderville@houseofathlete.com (Leger Douzable, Omar Kelly, Antoine Walker, Adam Jones, Brandon Marshall, Chantel Tremitiere)
